JobTitle: Data Engineer - Business Solutions (Round Rock TX or Hopkinton MA, potential for Remote within USA)
JobFullDesc: Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound impact as a Data Solutions Engineer with our Data Engineering team for global Services at Dell Technologies, based in Round Rock TX or Remote within the USA.Data Engineering and Data Science are all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Data Engineering uniquely enables untangling data complexity from data sets up to petabyte-scale, and addressing concerns regarding acumen, access and consumption across the entire organization. Our Data Engineering Council and Data Science peers engage in a grass-roots campaign to evangelize best practices, break down silos, raise community knowledge and showcase breakthrough tools and techniques. In addition to driving customer relationship management (CRM) platform transformation efforts, we are also enabling and aiding critical insights into operational efficiencies, overall margin improvement and continuous advancement of our customer experience (CX) across the global Services organization.  You will As Data Engineer, you will join a team leading the way in developing new methods of generating meaning from data – developing new environments, methodologies, processes, tools and data governance structures. You will also propose strategic or tactical plans based on business data and market trends.Your keys to success include your passion for innovation and the application of emerging data technologies, to the delivery of cutting-edge data engineering for data science and business intelligence solutions, and the ability to quickly learn new tools/technologies. Also, you will get to stretch your ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment in your daily responsibilities:·Participate in and provide thought leadership to strategic plan development, specific to big data and other analytics solutions·Engage with internal customers and stakeholders across a global and highly matrixed organization to analyze business goals, define project scope, and identify functional and technical requirements·Architect and build automated, foundational data processes, integrating data quality monitoring and alert systems;Develop and automate business reporting, dashboards, and executive readouts;Build/maintain analysis, monitoring, and productivity tools·Design, develop, and maintain scalable data solutions, optimizing technology stacks to produce fast, reliable, and accurate business insights·Work closely with product/program managers and developers in support of team projects/initiativesEssential Requirements ·2+ years of related experience in a professional role with a Bachelor’s degree or equivalent combination of Education and work experience; Experience to include:·Advanced MS SQL/Postgres SQL development and database architecture knowledge and skills in writing, querying and joining data for views, nesting queries, CTE’s, query optimization, data modeling, functions and more for advanced data reporting·Experience manipulating data from Data Lakes / Data Warehouses – and preparing the data for use in advanced reporting and visualizations in Tableau and Power BI·Hands on experience in business communications: including mining, aggregating, displaying and presenting data in MS Excel, Word, Access, PowerPoint, Visio·Excellent verbal, written and presentation communication skills and interpersonal skills, including creating excellent teamwork relationships built on trust​Desirable Requirements ·Tableau, PowerBI Salesforce application experience·Intermediate to advanced PythonHere’s our story;
